profile:
When all others fail, call the geeks. We will figure it out or your money back!

Garage Door Geeks are dedicated to bringing you satisfaction. With over 10 years of experience, our skilled technicians offer exceptional service to help keep your door last you longer. Garage Door Geeks technicians are provided with the skills and parts needed to make your door run smoothly. We offer warranty on all work that our qualified technicians perform on your garage door, along with the parts installed.

Our warranty is unbeatable, with flexible plans to help your garage door hold together strong for longer. We have great deals that will bring your door into optimal working condition. With all repairs performed, we lubricate your door with the proper spray lubricant. Before leaving your home, we give you important information on how to properly maintain your door. Without the proper knowledge of garage door mechanics, a home owner canâ€™t be expected to maintain a door. Our trained technicians give you a quick lesson on what are the key components and how to optimize the life of your garage door.
Why choose us

    Qualified technicians fully equipped with the knowledge and parts to repair your garage door
    Fast, friendly and affordable service, with exceptional punctuality making sure to work around your schedule
    After every visit, full lubrication of all hardware (springs, hinges, bearings and ball bearing garage rollers)
    Our trained technicians will quickly go over on what needs to be maintained seasonally to keep your door running longer

profile:
Few people realize the importance of a working garage door until it breaks down - garage doors are protection for you and your belongings. They house your car, your storage, and serve as an additional entrance to your home. For many they may feel like an afterthought, but they provide a great deal of security in a way that few other doors do.
Best Choice Garage Doors

At Best Choice Garage Doors, our goal is to help you with all of your garage door needs. We are available in Toronto and GTA and specialize in any and all garage door related services including:

    Installation â€“ When you need a new and state of the art garage door installed, we can provide you with the perfect choice for the design of your home â€“ one that will withstand the elements and provide you with the look and security you need.
    Repair â€“ When your garage door breaks down for any reason, our service experts are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We will send our professionals directly to your home to get your garage door fixed so you can feel safe and secure again.

We also offer both residential and commercial services, and are available for all of your garage door projects both large and small. Our customer service is second to none, and we will be happy to supply you with the installation, repair, or replacement that you need. Call us today to learn more about what we have to offer.

profile:
We are a small family owned business that can handle large scale jobs.  

We have been happily servicing both residential, commercial, industrial and property management customers across the GTA for the past 16 years, with over 26 years of experience in our trade. Our primary objective is to maintain the highest quality of service and workmanship in order to meet and exceed your expectations, while keeping our rates highly competitive.

We install new garage doors and automatic garage door openers as well as provide repairs to existing installations.  We serve locations in Mississauga, Etobicoke, Brampton, Oakville, Scarborough, North York and the outskirts of the Greater Toronto Area.

FULL WARRANTY on all work done, and we provide FREE quotes on all work!  Absolutely no hidden fees when we arrive, and the job will be done at the quoted price.  If there is something that we find additional to the quote, we will inform you before we start working, and if you decide to cancel the job, there will be no charge to you whatsoever.

profile:
Fix It Right Garage Doors has been in the industry for years, meaning that when it comes to experience within the GTA, we are your best bet. Our company is one of the most reputable, trusted names in garage door repairs and installations. We offer a variety of products, installing, replacing parts and repairing locally. Our technicians are capable of a number of repair and installation services such as: Residential and commercial garage door installations, garage repair and maintenance, fixing snapped or broken cables and installation of new motors. 

We operate on the basis of full transparency, meaning we will never mislead our customers in any way. Our only goal is to ensure your 100% satisfaction with our repair or installation services, which is why we offer a lifetime warranty on all services and offer complete diagnostics before undertaking any repairs or installations. We help you determine the correct course of action for your budget, homeâ€™s exterior, garage door and needs. In order to fully support you, we offer only the best brands in the industry such as LiftMaster, Richards-Wilcox, Clopay, Genie, Steel-Craft, C.H.I, Pentagon and Haas doors. Our spare parts are from genuine manufacturers, and we stock parts for almost all makes and models of garage door. In this way, we can guarantee your satisfaction with our services.

Call us now and experience the difference our superior technical skills, expansive selection and committment to transparency can offer you. Contact us for a service call!

profile: Future Buildings is a large manufacturer and distributor of prefabricated steel buildings. The company was founded in 1981. Its headquarters is based in Markham, Ontario, Canada. Future Buildings offers the following types steel buildings: Garage, Workshop, Storage, Agricultural, and Commercial. An estimate is provided on a free of charge basis. The company also offers a free brochure. All buildings come in kit form with manuals. They are made from Galvalume Plus Steel. Future Buildings provides a 30 year rust perforation warranty. Customer assistance is provided by phone and by e-mail.

profile:
All Overhead Doors

We have been in business since 2006, with professional staff having over 20 years of experience in the Overhead Door Industry.  We service the entire GTA and beyond including Georgetown, King City, Nobleton, Milton, Oshawa, Barrie, etc.  

We are a small company that prides itself in its service.  We specialize in Custom Residential Garage Doors in Wood or Steel Maintenance Free Insulated Doors and carry only Liftmaster/Chamberlain electric operators and all accessories.   

We have an excellent and friendly service staff to look after all your repair needs, including springs, cables, tracks, balancing lubrication, and anything related to having your garage door function properly. 

We are an official provider of many Manufacturers so there no product or style we can not provide.

We offer a 24/HR Service and FREE On Site Estimates so please contact at any time.

profile:
Candoor Overhead Doors ltd, is a leader in the garage door industry. We are family owned and operated and established in 1988. Since then we have build a company based on reliability, honesty, knowledge and quality workmanship. We provide customers with premium installations, technical sales, residential and commercial services, and distribution/retail sales. We are also Ontario's top installation and supply company for security shutters, roller shutters, cabana shutters and roll up garage doors.

For over 30 years we have been servicing the GTA and surrounding regions; currently we service the GTA, Orangeville to Collingwood and Cottage Country (Muskoka, Haliburton, Georgian Bay, Gravenhurst, Bracebridge and Huntsville).

We have partnered with the highest of quality manufacturers to provide our customer with the most exceptional garage doors, garage door openers, security shutters and rolling door products. Whether your home is looking for a new and updated traditional look, modern garage door, something more classic looking, cabana/ pool house roller shutters or a security coverings for your windows or doors we guarantee we will have the right door for you at the right price!

profile:
Ontario Garage Door Repair Services has been leading the garage door repair industry in the Ontario region for more than 25 years now. We are a family run business that is licensed, insured and bonded. With us, we bring to the forefront our experience, technical know-how and in-depth knowledge of all matters related to garage doors, garage door openers and garage door parts. We have gained our skills through hard work over two decades and we take pride in ourselves for being able to offer top-class services and products to our customers and clients. We specialize in both commercial garage doors as well as residential garage doors.


In the GTA, ( ON)  we have built an enviable reputation for ourselves through our competitive services and reasonable pricing. We are well known for the quality of our products and the guarantee and warranty we offer on them. So, if you are looking for garage door experts for your property, get in touch with us and our team will offer you the best garage door installation service in the area.

Why Us

Ontario Garage Door Repair Services is the best when it comes to garage door installation and garage door repair. Here is why you should choose us:

>> Two-plus decades of experience in providing garage door services
>> Affordable pricing with top quality spare parts
>> Experienced technicians with years of training and work-ex under their belts
Round the clock services and special attention to emergencies
>> 100% customer satisfaction with top-class garage door installation and repairs

profile:
The Direct Drive Technology offers a traveling motor that glides silently along a fixed chain.

Extremely durable and long lasting due to only one moving part. The motor of the garage door opener is located at the door instead of the back of the garage door opener, maximizing power and minimizing wear and tear.

Extremely quiet garage door opener with virtually no vibrations. Perfect for homes with living spaces above or near the garage. 

Maximum lifting force because the motor is directly attached to the door.

profile:
At Lift Pro Doors we specialize in commercial, residential, and industrial garage doors.  Our collection of products include overhead, steel, aluminum, rolling steel, speed traffic rapid doors and much more. We offer different types of services that include installation, repair and services for all types of garage doors and garage door openers. We provide sales and services for commercial warehouses, office buildings, malls, condominiums, manufacturing facilities and residential homes.

Lift Pro Doors are THE garage door experts in Canada and will impress you with our work ethic, professionalism and dedication. We have earned an outstanding reputation for high-quality doors, workmanship and first-class customer service. We are a one-stop solution for all of your garage door needs. Whether itâ€™s repairing, servicing or installation of a new or existing garage door, you can rely on us! Our experienced, trained and knowledgeable staff will ensure you get the most cost efficient and top quality service every time. Lift Pro Doors has garage doors and openers for custom, replacement and new fit doors.

profile:
A-ONE Garage Door designs and manufactures high quality insulated garage door products to the Canadian markets from our Ontario Plants.
 
As a leading brand in the garage door industry, A-ONE is committed to offering a wide variety of distinctive designs and helpful selection tools for customers across Canada.
 
Our full range of products also covers electric garage door openers and many other accessories to go with your garage door. We also provide full installation and repair service. 
 
Our factory is located at 110 Torbay Road, Markham. On behalf of our whole team, I invite and welcome you to come and visit us.

profile:
Garage Doors, Entry Doors, Service and Repairs

A family owned business since 1946, Adams Door Systems Inc. is proud to be a Master Authorized Dealer in the Mississauga, Vaughan and Toronto (GTA) areas for Clopay Garage Doors and LiftMaster electric openers. We offer sales, installation, and servicing for residential garage doors in styles ranging from vintage carriage house style doors to traditional raised panel doors.. And our LiftMaster openers will open your door safely, reliably, and quietly. All installations include a 1 year labour warranty. And now, we are offering Clopay entry doors through our West Location. Clopay exterior doors are the first and only entry doors on the market specifically designed to coordinate perfectly with your new garage door. Designed to extend Clopay's legacy of excellence, they offer unsurpassed beauty, quality of construction, and cutting-edge sustainable manufacturing techniques.

Visit One Of Toronto's Largest Showrooms for Garage Doors and Entry Doors

Expert Garage Door Fort Wayne IN

Finding affordable garage door service of high quality is not easy. Although many service providers promise the best services to their clients, not all of them have what is required to deliver quality services. Therefore, carry out some research on services of different providers of garage door repair services before hiring their services. Majority of modern day service providers have websites through which they relay information about their services. You can visit these websites for information about the kind of services to expect from a firm. They also have information on prices based on the kind of services you are looking for.
